name: OpenWeatherMap Tool
semantic_context: Gets current and future weather information
natural_language_description: 这是 OpenWeatherMap Tool 节点。主要用于: Gets current and future weather information

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Gets current and future weather information
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Gets current and future weather information | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: currentWeather
available_options: Current Weather (值: currentWeather) - Returns the current weather data
5 Day Forecast (值: 5DayForecast) - Returns the weather data for the next 5 days

format.name: format
format.description: The format in which format the data should be returned
format.natural_language_description: 参数名: Format | 作用: The format in which format the data should be returned | 默认值: metric

locationSelection.name: locationSelection
locationSelection.description: How to define the location for which to return the weather
locationSelection.natural_language_description: 参数名: Location Selection | 作用: How to define the location for which to return the weather | 默认值: cityName

cityName.name: cityName
cityName.description: The name of the city to return the weather of
cityName.natural_language_description: 参数名: City | 作用: The name of the city to return the weather of | (必填项)

cityId.name: cityId
cityId.description: The ID of city to return the weather of. List can be downloaded here: http://bulk.openweathermap.org/sample/.
cityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: City ID | 作用: The ID of city to return the weather of. List can be downloaded here: http://bulk.openweathermap.org/sample/. | 默认值: 160001123 | (必填项)

latitude.name: latitude
latitude.description: The latitude of the location to return the weather of
latitude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Latitude | 作用: The latitude of the location to return the weather of | (必填项)

longitude.name: longitude
longitude.description: The longitude of the location to return the weather of
longitude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Longitude | 作用: The longitude of the location to return the weather of | (必填项)

zipCode.name: zipCode
zipCode.description: The ID of city to return the weather of. List can be downloaded here: http://bulk.openweathermap.org/sample/.
zipCode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Zip Code | 作用: The ID of city to return the weather of. List can be downloaded here: http://bulk.openweathermap.org/sample/. | (必填项)

language.name: language
language.description: The two letter language code to get your output in (eg. en, de, ...).
language.natural_language_description: 参数名: Language | 作用: The two letter language code to get your output in (eg. en, de, ...).
